Steps.Message: Update at 12:46 - Our specialist cable jointers have so far been unable to pinpoint the underground cabling fault, so they have instructed our digging gang to excavate our cabling. This will allow them to cut our cable, and using specialist equipment, test each side to help narrow down where the fault lies.  In doing this, we have been able to restore some properties in the area. To give them further time to complete their work, we're now estimating to have the power back on between 14:00 and 15:00. We're sorry to change the timeframe. We'll continue to keep you updated.

We became aware of a power cut at 03:52. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

This will allow them to cut our cable, and using specialist equipment, test each side to help narrow down where the fault lies.  In doing this, we have been able to restore some properties in the area. To give them further time to complete their work, we're now estimating to have the power back on between 14:00 and 15:00. We're sorry to change the timeframe. We'll continue to keep you updated.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
